The comments attributed to Dr: Anthony Fauci were found on Facebook and Twitter posts, which were linked in the claim.
The claim mentions that Dr: Fauci is a renowned expert in infectious diseases and has advised six presidents since 1984, adding credibility to the comments.
The National Institute of Allergy and In: NIAID), where Dr. Fauci serves as the head, confirmed that he has never used the language used in the comments attributed to him.
The original author of the comments: Amy Wright, came forward and confirmed that she wrote the comments, expressing surprise that they were being misattributed to Dr. Fauci.
